1�What are you doing here? This is no place for civilians.

1�Greetings. I am 	 of the San d'Orian Provincial Knights.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Bastokan Legion.
1�Greetings. I am 	 of the Federation of Windurst.
1�Greetings. I am 	, Campaign Arbiter for the Allied Forces.
1�What can I help you with?Nothing.Performance assessment.New Allied Tags.Temporary items.Union registration.Teleportation.Information on the Allied Campaign.
1�You've already undergone an evaluation for this battle, or had you forgotten?As much as I'd like to, I'm forbidden from providing you with a new set of Allied Taegs until the next battle begins.

�!�I am sorry,  , but your campaign medal has expired. I cannot issue tags to anyone not authorized by the Allied Forces. Return to your nation's capital and speak with a Campaign Evaluation Official.

1�Complete transaction and return to capital?Yes.No.
1�What would you like to know?Nothing. I'm sorry.About performance assessment.About Allied Tags.About temporary items.About Unions.
1�Anyone wearing Allied Tags while participating in a campaign battle will be judged on their overall performance.
1�Soldiers will be evaluated not only on their fighting skills, but also on how much they contribute to the efforts of their allies through means such as healing and enhancing.
1�However, beware that if you leave the area before being assessed, you will be deemed a deserter and will forfeit all rewards earned that day.
1�Also, while there are no immediate penalties for being knocked out, falling in battle will significantly lower the score given to you.
1�When you are ready to receive compensation for your work on the field, return to me and I shall assess your performance and provide you with your payment.
1�That is all.
1�Allied Tags are a special type of identification given to all participants of Allied Campaign battles.
1�There are benefits, as well as drawbacks, to wearing the tags. One of the benefits is that in the case you are knocked out on the battlefield, you will not lose any experience points.
1�However, some of the drawbacks include the inability to improve skills and earn experience points for individual kills, as well as the right to loot fallen enemies.
1�That is all.
1�Temporary items can be purchased in exchange for Allied Notes.
1�There are several different varieties of items, but they all have one thing in common--they can only be used on the battlefield they were issued.
1�It is highly recommended that you first survey a battle's conditions and then select the supplies that you believe will benefit you most.
1�Please remember that all temporary items you carry on your person will be confiscated in the event that you leave the area.
1�That is all.
1�Oh ho! Keen to join a Union, are we?Very well. Listen up and I shall tell you all you need to know.

1�In order to better coordinate Allied efforts against the beastman menace, we have instituted a system of ad hoc tactical regiments called ??Unions.?? With five units to a battlefield, union registration is open to any proven soldier in possession of Allied Tags.
1�In return for their aid in advancing the war effort, union registrants will be eligible to earn a share of the spoils of war.

1�Needless to say, the choicest rewards will be reserved for those unions which make the greatest contributions in combat.Prove your mettle on the field of battle, and you will earn glory for your union, as well as a sizable bounty of your own.

1�Be forewarned that your commitment to your union comes first and foremost.In the aftermath of battle, you will not be permitted to reap rewards from your individual exploits until your union has distributed its plunder.
1�That is all.
1�Which?Nevermind.Qiqirn.ColibriPukPoroggoAmeretatMaridWivreMamool JaGearHydra
1�Step right up, ?[mister/lady]!No, don't tell me: yer lookin' for a Hume broad.
1�'Bout yea tall? Sword on her hip?Sure, I know where she's lyin' low.
1�Whoa now! What's with the cynical stare?Could it be that...<gasp>...you don't trust me?
1�I'm wounded. Deeply, like.Why, I couldn't tell a lie if ya paid me! Well, depends on how much...
1�Bah, fine, don't believe me!No skin off my wings.
1�Well, looky who's back. And with  $????, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?
1�Listen up, then. I'll tell ya all I know about yer Klara lady..........6 And that's all I know.
1�You wingless ones really ain't too bright, are ya?Didn't yer mommy ever tell ya not to trust an imp?
1�Well, looky who's back. And with  $????, t' boot.Decided to trust ol' Rikke, did ya?
1�A shrewd decision, my friend. Astute, even.
1�That Klara lady is lyin' low up aboveIn a corner of the southwest chamber, like.
1�I'd tell ya more, but the boss, he don't let us lackeys get too close.Not even the smart ones like yers truly.
1�Don't blame him, though.If word got out that he was usin' a mortal for his plans, things might get all complicated-like.
1�...And that's all I'm gonna say on the matter.No hard feelings, but I like my wings attached to my body, thankyaverymuch.
1�Ya'd have better luck gettin' the lowdown from the Shadow Lord himself than trustin' a word that comes out of the mouth of the swindler to th'  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] of me.
1�Look into these eyes.Do they look like lyin' eyes to you? Wait, don't answer that...
1�Ya'd have better luck gettin' the lowdown from the Shadow Lord himself than trustin' a word that comes out of the mouth of the swindler to th'  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] of me.
1�You again? Didn't I already tell ya that your lady is up above, in the southwest chamber?
1�Now scram, before the boss makes a Rikkebab outta me for talkin' to you!
1�You wingless ones really ain't too bright, are ya?Didn't yer mommy ever tell ya not to trust an imp?
1�Saw through our little ruse, did ya?Ya got a better head on yer shoulders than most wingless ones, I'll give ya that.
1�Oh, now you come back, do ya? ??Oh, Rikke! How could I ever have doubted you???Bah! Yer a day late and about a hundred beastcoins short, ?[mister/lady].
1�Intruder alert! Intruder alert!Woooooo! Woooooo!
1�...Or that's what I'd say if I weren't on break.Move along now. Nothin' to see here!
1�Oh, look...another Allied soldier.How dreadfully exciting.
1�Let me guess: you're searching for someone and need my help.Oh, will the fun ever stop? <Yawn>...

1�Bring me 
 	)????????, then we can talk.If I feel like it.
1�Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�Fine. then go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�You want a pat on the back? A cookie, perhaps?
1�What, you actually thought I'd tell you where the woman is?Maybe I would, if I knew...or cared. Now scram.
1�Am I supposed to give you a round of applause or something?
1�Oh, the Hume woman.Yeah, I saw her up above, in the southwest chamber. Or somewhere around there.
1�I'd tell you more if I knew. Or cared.
1�Beats me why the boss needs a Hume for his plans.If he's having fun, more power to him.
1�You could go see for yourself and leave me alone.That'd be just super.
1�If you don't trust me, go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�My buddy to the  �[southeast/northwest/north/west] talks the talk, but he couldn't tell the truth if his life depended on it.
1�If you don't trust me, go see my friend to the  �[east/north] of here.He's as honest as they come.
1�That woman you were looking for?Yeah, I saw her in the southwest chamber up above. Or somewhere around there.
1�But didn't I already tell you that?Gee, my head hurts...
1�What, you actually thought I'd tell you where the woman is?Maybe I would, if I knew...or cared. Now scram.
1�Oh, so one of the others helped you.That's just great. Wonderful. Bully for you.
1�Back to beg for my help, are you?You must have confused me with someone who cares...
1�Sleeping on the job? Perish the thought!I was just, uh, lulling the enemy into a false sense of security. Yeah, that's the ticket...
1�Yeeeeees? You have business with me, you do?

1�Or maybe you make it worth my while?Bring Rokke 
 shiny 	)????????, perhaps?
1�You trust Rokke, yes?Rokke no lie to no one.
1�Oh, it's you. You bring shiny #???? for Rokke, yeeeeees?
1�You nice ?[guy/lady].Too bad Rokke not actually know anything.
1�Rokke just make funny. Ha ha, hee hee, you know?Hm? You not laughing...
1�Oh, it's you. You bring shiny #???? for Rokke, yeeeeees?
1�Okay, promise is promise, yes it is....What was promise again?
1�Oh! Hume woman. Yes yes, I know.She up above, in secret place. Southwest chamber, you know?
1�You need know more? You go yourself.Boss no let Rokke get too close, no.
1�I no know what boss be thinking, using Hume for his plans.Then again, boss no pay Rokke to know, no?
1�But Rokke know one thing: you go there, you be very, veeery careful, yes?You be careful...or you be dead.
1�My buddy  �[southeasty/northwesty/northy/westy] of here say he help you?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You meet my friend Rikke, yes? Northwesty of here?He smart. He honest too.
1�My buddy  �[southeasty/northwesty/northy/westy] of here say he help you?Oh, don't trust him, no no no.
1�You back again? You forget what Rokke tell you?Uh oh...Rokke forget too!
1�Ahahaha, Rokke just make funny, yes?Hume woman up above, in southwest chamber. You remember well now, yeees?
1�You back? You want Rokke tell you another joke?An imp, an Ahriman, and a ruszor walk into a tavern, yes...?
1�You trust Rokke, yes?Rokke no lie to no one.
1�Oh, so one of the others helped you.That's just great. Wonderful. Bully for you.
1�Look who's back, after blowin' me off the last time.What did you want again? And why should I care?
1�Eleventy-three intruders, eleventy-four--No, wait... Eleventy-five?
1�Stupid wingless one! Always scamper and scurry back and forth, make Rokke lose count!Boss not gonna be happy about this...
1�Captain!
n!�What did she mean, Zeid?What exactly happened between you and the captain at Beaucedine...?
1�Behind a stone structure in the northeast chamber, was it?We must make for there right away!
1�What is it, Nicolaus?We've not much time, so make it brief.
1�Very well. I'll trust the two of you to get to the bottom of this.Zeid,  , with me now!
1�Captain!
1�Captain!?
1�Nicolaus, Five Moons!What happened here!? Are you all right?
1�As a matter of fact...
1�Yes. Combined with the knowledge we gleaned from Zeid--
1�You believe so as well, Nicolaus?
1�Power greater than the Shadow Lord!?So that's your scheme!

1�Hear me, fiend! Zeid is no longer the brutal killer you knew.All changed that day when Captain Klara reached out and took his hand.The Zeid before us is an honorable man--one who has struggled long and hard to redeem himself. He would sooner die than join the likes of you!
1�Blast! Not again--
1�Zeid, no!
!!�Curse it all!
1�Quickly! We must find him!
1�Very well! We find the demon, and destroy his accursed gem once and for all!
1�But where to search? The fiend said that he was taking Zeid to meet--
1�It is good to see you safe, Captain Allenberge.And I fear that you heard correctly.
1�Thank you, Captain. Your support is most welcome.
1�Very well,  , Musketeers!You heard Captain Allenberge. Let's make short work of those fluttering fiends!
1�We've come for answers.You will tell us who--or what--you are.
1�Silence, foul thing. I do not recall being saved by the likes of you.What have you done with the true Captain Klara?
1�Yes, that sentry from the Hydra Corps seemed all too pleased with his discovery...
1�So it was you all along...
1�What have you done with her!?
1�...Enough.I will join you.
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !
1�I'll round up Volker and the others.We rendezvous at the location of which the imp spoke. Be safe,  !
1�If the mutterings of those imps are to be believed, their leader is plotting something in these parts.
1�If Captain Klara is truly in league with these demonspawn, we might very well find evidence here.
1�Not another step, fiends!
1�...Volker?
1�I can only hope that the three of you fared better.
1�It is clear enough... Captain Klara has been possessed.
1�Taking everything into consideration, it is the only logical conclusion.
1�Wait, Volker.We could chase him to the Shadow Lord's throne room, but what good would that do us?
1�Why, his jewel, of course.
1�It is the jewel that is the source of his power...that which allows him to pull the strings of mortal souls as if they were mere puppets.That much is clear from Zeid's tale.
1�We destroy the jewel, and his threats to take Captain Klara's life are rendered hollow.Zeid will have no reason to obey him.
1�That Captain Klara remains in the demon's thrall is proof enough of this.
1�Yes, I fear that our destination is most clear: the throne room of the Shadow Lord himself.
1�I would not be so quick to discount the word of your men, Captain.
1�Five Moons and I discovered a passage connecting this chamber with the throne room.Perhaps our furtive gargouille friend is lurking somewhere within.
1�At any rate, the issue at hand is thus: how to lure the gargouille out without attracting the attention of his masters?
1�I shall remain as well.It would be unwise to operate alone in such a perilous place.
1�Nicolaus! Over here!
1�They came on us...too quickly...We weren't...ready for them...
1�Yes. Searching the wall, we found...a concealed passage.
1�A demon, you say!?And it emerged from the captain's shadow?
1�But how...?
1�I do not understand, Nicolaus... Did the captain not destroy the jewel six years ago?
1�Indeed. We explored a bit ourselves, until we were driven out by some demons who didn't appreciate us getting too close to their nest.
1�Impossible...there must be something we've overlooked.Tear the walls apart if you must, I want--
1�Hah! Bold words from a traitorous wench.But will you have the same swagger with a blade in your breast?
-!�It would appear our fortunes have reversed.
1�What in the Goddess's name is happening here!?
..�What the--? What is this place?
1�It would seem that the woman carried us to safety...but to what end?
1�Was she not fighting alongside our enemy but a moment prior?
1�And that Kindred...Clearly, we are dealing with forces beyond our comprehension.
1�That was the woman of which you spoke?
1�I know not what errand brings you here...But you would do well to forget her, and leave this wretched place far, far behind...
1�...But forgive me. I overstep my bounds.
1�In any event, you have our gratitude.Please accept this in return for your aid.
1�It has served my Hydras well in battling the dark hordes.I trust it shall do the same for you.
1�And now, I must be off in search of my men.
1�Your friends must be in the vicinity as well.May the Goddess lead you safely to their side.
1�I see... Well, 'tis hardly my place to bar your way.
1�A passage? Leading to the throne room, you say!?
1�Perhaps there is a way.Intelligence has it that gargouilles under the Shadow Lord's command often serve in a supervisory capacity over lesser fiends.
1�If we were to dispatch the imps in the vicinity and cause a bit of a stir, like as not our quarry would emerge to investigate the disturbance. My men and I would be honored to assist you.
1�It would seem that the operation was a rousing success.
1�All clear here as well, Captain!
1�Wh-who goes there!?Identify yourself at once!
1�Ever the stubborn one, I see...
1�Shall I show you the wound I suffered saving your ungrateful hide?The wound that still burns to this day...
1�Heh heh heh... If I were you, I'd worry less about me, and more about your own well-being.
!?�Care to put up a fight?It's been so long since we've been properly entertained.
1�Well, well...if it isn't the Meddling Musketeers.Another pack of rodents who couldn't resist the bait.
1�All the better; vermin are so much more easily dispatched en masse.
1�Bah! Useless, the lot of them!
1�We meet again, old friend.
1�Pathetic as ever, I see.Worthless as your mortal life may be, to think you would risk it for a mere woman... For a Hume...
1�Oho. Your voice trembles with rage.Excellent... Perhaps all is not lost for you yet!
1�The woman shall be freed. She has long since outlived her usefulness to us.In return, I ask for but one thing...
1�Join me, Zeid.
1�Why do you waver?
1�Open your eyes, Zeid! This is no place for you!These feeble mortals will never accept one possessed of your potential.
1�Join the armies of darkness, and you will be hailed as a hero.Unfathomable power will be yours...power beyond even that of the Shadow Lord himself!
1�Such confident words.How soon you forget that I hold the life of his savior in my hands...
1�Now if you'll excuse us, I believe Zeid and I were having a private conversation.
1�Heh heh heh...a wise decision, old friend.Then come. There is someone who has long waited to make your acquaintance...
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Truth Lies Hid(pt.1).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.2).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.3).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.4).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.5).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.6).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.7).The Truth Lies Hid(pt.8).Bonds of Mythril(pt.1).Bonds of Mythril(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�You have registered a new home point!You are now able to teleport here from any other home point.
1�A home point can be set as a spot for you to return to Vana'diel when you have been knocked out. You can also use a home point to teleport to other home point
s.�What will you do?Travel to another home point.Set this as your home point.Other settings.On second thought, never mind.
1�You may change the method of selecting the area of your desired home point to teleport t
o.�Which setting would you like?My current setting.Select by region.Select by expansion.
1�You are now selecting by  [region/expansion
1�You are now selecting by  [region/expansion
?B�You can set this as your current home point.Once you set a home point, you will return there whenever you are incapacitate
